rooms.description: You stand in a grand entrance hall with marble floors and high ceilings. Torches flicker along the walls, casting dancing shadows. Ancient symbols are carved into the stonework.
This chamber has faded tapestries on the walls depicting ancient battles. The air is cool and still. Rusted weapons and armor lie scattered about.
Rows of bookshelves fill this room, many with ancient tomes. Dust motes float in the air, visible in beams of light from high windows.
This hidden chamber contains a valuable treasure chest. Gold coins spill onto the floor and jewels glitter in the torchlight.
A long stone corridor stretches north, lined with unlit braziers. The ceiling arches high above, disappearing into shadows.
Weapon racks line the walls of this chamber, though most are empty. A few rusty swords and dented shields remain.
Shelves and crates fill this dusty room. Most supplies have rotted away, but a few items might still be useful.
A magnificent stone staircase spirals upward. Elaborate carvings adorn the banister, depicting scenes of ancient glory.
At the top of the grand staircase, a spacious landing opens up with doorways leading in several directions.
This balcony overlooks a vast courtyard, now overgrown with wild vegetation. The view extends for miles across the surrounding countryside.
This circular room contains magical apparatus and shelves of arcane ingredients. A large crystal ball sits on a central pedestal.
A grand four-poster bed dominates this opulent room. Faded tapestries hang from the walls, and a thick layer of dust covers everything.
This narrow, hidden passage is cold and damp. Water drips from the ceiling, and the walls are slick with moisture.
This magnificent chamber contains an ornate throne carved from a single piece of marble. Ancient magic still lingers in the air.
The legendary crown of the ancient kingdom rests on a velvet cushion in this well-protected chamber. You have reached your ultimate goal!

items.name: Silver Key
items.when_used: The key fits perfectly into the lock and turns with a satisfying click.
items.description: A small silver key with ornate engravings. It looks important.

items.name: Old Book
items.when_used: You carefully open the book and read a few pages about the ancient crown.
items.description: A dusty tome bound in leather with faded gold lettering on the spine.

items.name: Gold Coins
items.when_used: You count the coins - there are more than you initially thought!
items.description: A small pile of gleaming gold coins from a forgotten age.

items.name: Ruby Necklace
items.when_used: You hold the necklace up to the light, admiring its brilliance.
items.description: A delicate silver chain with a large ruby pendant that catches the light beautifully.

items.name: Torch
items.when_used: You light the torch, illuminating the darkness around you.
items.description: A wooden torch with a cloth-wrapped end, perfect for lighting dark passages.

items.name: Bronze Shield
items.when_used: You raise the shield defensively, ready to block incoming attacks.
items.description: A sturdy bronze shield with the emblem of an eagle. Though dented, it's still serviceable.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.when_used: You drink the potion and feel a warm glow spread through your body as your wounds heal.
items.description: A small glass vial containing a bright red liquid that smells of herbs and spices.

items.name: Spyglass
items.when_used: You peer through the spyglass, bringing distant objects into clear focus.
items.description: A brass telescope that extends to reveal multiple glass lenses for viewing far-off objects.

items.name: Magic Scroll
items.when_used: You read the arcane words on the scroll, releasing a burst of magical energy.
items.description: A yellowed parchment covered with strange symbols and glowing runes.

items.name: Golden Comb
items.when_used: You run the comb through your hair, feeling oddly refreshed and revitalized.
items.description: An ornate golden comb with jeweled teeth, clearly once belonging to royalty.

items.name: Ancient Crown
items.when_used: You place the crown on your head and feel the weight of ancient power and responsibility.
items.description: The legendary crown of the ancient kingdom, forged of precious metals and set with dazzling jewels.

fixtures.name: Stone Pedestal
fixtures.description: A carved stone pedestal with intricate designs around its base.

fixtures.name: Wooden Chest
fixtures.description: An old wooden chest with iron bindings. It appears to be locked.

fixtures.name: Reading Desk
fixtures.description: A sturdy wooden desk with an angled surface for reading large books.

fixtures.name: Treasure Chest
fixtures.description: A large ornate chest filled with various treasures and valuables.

fixtures.name: Wall Brazier
fixtures.description: An iron brazier attached to the wall, designed to hold a torch or burning coals.

fixtures.name: Weapon Rack
fixtures.description: A wooden rack designed to hold various weapons, though most slots are now empty.

fixtures.name: Wooden Crates
fixtures.description: Stacked wooden crates containing various supplies, most now rotten or useless.

fixtures.name: Stone Staircase
fixtures.description: A grand spiral staircase carved from stone, leading to upper levels of the citadel.

fixtures.name: Faded Carpet
fixtures.description: A once-luxurious carpet, now faded and threadbare from centuries of use.

fixtures.name: Stone Railing
fixtures.description: A decorative stone balustrade running along the edge of the balcony.

fixtures.name: Crystal Ball
fixtures.description: A perfectly clear sphere of crystal that seems to glow with an inner light.

fixtures.name: Royal Bed
fixtures.description: A grand four-poster bed with rotting silk hangings and a dusty mattress.

fixtures.name: Rusty Sconce
fixtures.description: An old iron sconce protruding from the wall, heavily rusted from the damp.

fixtures.name: Marble Throne
fixtures.description: A magnificent throne carved from a single piece of white marble with gold inlay.

fixtures.name: Pedestal of Light
fixtures.description: A glowing pedestal that emits a soft, ethereal light. The crown rests upon it.

puzzles.name: Door Riddle
puzzles.description: A riddle is carved above the eastern door: 'I have pages but no words, spines but no bones. What am I?'
puzzles.effects: The door is magically sealed until you solve the riddle.

puzzles.name: Magic Lock
puzzles.description: A magical barrier blocks the doorway, shimmering with arcane energy.
puzzles.effects: A magical force prevents access to the hidden chamber beyond.

monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.attack_description: The goblin lunges at you with a rusty dagger!
monsters.description: A small green goblin with a wicked grin and a rusty dagger.
monsters.effects: A goblin blocks your path, clutching a rusty dagger.

monsters.name: Giant Rat
monsters.attack_description: The giant rat leaps at you, attempting to bite!
monsters.description: A rat the size of a small dog with matted fur and sharp teeth.
monsters.effects: A giant rat scurries among the crates, hissing at your approach.

monsters.name: Cave Spider
monsters.attack_description: The cave spider attempts to ensnare you in its sticky web!
monsters.description: A huge spider with a body the size of a dinner plate and hairy legs twice as long.
monsters.effects: A massive cave spider blocks the passage, its many eyes gleaming in the darkness.

monsters.name: Ghost King
monsters.attack_description: The ghost king swings his spectral sword, chilling you to the bone!
monsters.description: The translucent figure of an ancient king, still wearing his royal regalia.
monsters.effects: The ghost of the ancient king stands before his throne, watching you with hollow eyes.
